title: Under western skies
brief_description: A survey of the dry farming and the irrigation farming practices carried out in the western states of USA furing the 1940’s. Criticism made towards farmers, ranchers and timber merchants for land abuse, soil degradation and water irrigation. Examples shown of conservation farming.
